column3: So we ran across this small hidden place about a year ago, We decided to stop in for a couples message and it was amazing.The masseuses where dead on their techniques and got every single tense spot that ached. We got the one hour massage and when went to pay it was only $60.00!!!!! 🙏🏽🙏🏽🙏🏽💕💕💕.We fell in love with the quality of the service and cleanliness of the establishment. The staff were all from the orient and spoke little English but their humble attitude made the service splendid.We have been going at least once a month for the last year and we love it every single time. No need to spend hundreds at places were the staff feels entitle and seem like there is no desire to work.Here the staff brings a piece of the orient to you. If you are cruising through and are tense, I recommend this place for an hour of pure relaxation.The wife and I give it 2 thumbs and toes up!!!!!!
